CustomField.formula: ROUND(BuyAmountJPN__c * BuyTaxInitial__c,0) + TAX_ADJUSTMENT__c /* IF (clofor_com_cfs__Tariff__r.clofor_com_cfs__wkTaxFlag__c, clofor_com_cfs__BuyAmountJPN__c * clofor_com_cfs__BuyTaxInitial__c + clofor_com_cfs__TAX_ADJUSTMENT__c , 0 ) */
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Amount of Tax-Buying(Local)=Total Amount of Buying(Local)*Consumption Tax Ratio-Buying(Local)/100. ***Comsumption Tax Ratio-Buying Field shows percentage. **
CustomField.label: AMOUNT OF TAX-BUYING(LOCAL)
